description: NOTE: Scifer can also create .SEN archives, which store the header and binary data in the same file.

common_filenames.description: ba.ba - Saved game file created by older versions of Baba Is You.
0ba.ba - Stores game progress data saved in the first save slot.
1ba.ba - Stores game progress data saved in the second save slot.
2ba.ba - Stores game progress data saved in the third save slot.
